# thalassa_dbaas_pg_grant (Resource)

Create a PostgreSQL grant for a role on a database



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `database_name` (String) The name of the database to grant permissions on
- `db_cluster_id` (String) The ID of the database cluster
- `name` (String) The name of the grant
- `read` (Boolean) Whether the role can read from the database
- `role_name` (String) The name of the role to grant permissions to
- `write` (Boolean) Whether the role can write to the database

### Optional

- `organisation_id` (String) Reference to the Organisation of the Db Cluster. If not provided, the organisation of the (Terraform) provider will be used.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of the PostgreSQL grant (grant name)
